0: RESOLUTION RESPECTFULLY REQUESTING HIS EXCELLENCY PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO RECONSIDER THE PLAN TO BUILD A SECOND MILITARY CAMP IN MARAWI CITY IN ORDER TO SPEED UP THE RECONSTRUCTION AND REHABILITATION OF MARAWI CITY AND PROTECT THE RIGHT OF THE RESIDENTS OF GROUND ZERO TO RETURN TO THEIR HOMES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00576
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION RESPECTFULLY REQUESTING HIS EXCELLENCY PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO RECONSIDER THE PLAN TO BUILD A SECOND MILITARY CAMP IN MARAWI CITY IN ORDER TO SPEED UP THE RECONSTRUCTION AND REHABILITATION OF MARAWI CITY AND PROTECT THE RIGHT OF THE RESIDENTS OF GROUND ZERO TO RETURN TO THEIR HOMES

DATE FILED : 2019-12-05

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
